CustomField.description: (1) Poor Quality: It is difficult to understand any outcomes or results from the report; (2) Some outcomes but unclear: Report shares outcomes or results but reader is left with questions or lack of clarity in some aspects; (3) Clear and strong: Report shares clear outcomes and results linked to program activities and movement building efforts
CustomField.inlineHelpText: (1) Poor Quality: difficult to understand any outcomes or results from the report; (2) Some outcomes but unclear, lack of clarity; (3) Clear and strong: Report shares clear outcomes and results linked to program activities and movement building efforts
CustomField.label: Quality of report ranking
